name: damningly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that includes a lot of criticism or shows clearly that someone is wrong, guilty, or has behaved very badly: Damningly, more than 80 percent of complaints against the company were upheld. Most damningly, the report found that prison heads failed to tackle race discrimination.
More examplesFewer examplesDamningly, it has been proved that nobody in the government bothered to correct the inaccurate claim.Most damningly, witnesses said he told them that he intended to steal the money.
